attributes.action: get britain out of the EU
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.thesun.co.uk/sol/homepage/news/politics/4635229/Angela-Merkel-wants-further-400m-from-Britain-for-EU.html

 ANGELA Merkel has demanded Britain stump up £400million more a year to the EU during tense Downing Street talks with David Cameron.

It's time we left the EU our economy cannot take anymore. How much longer are we going to let this go on?
